Listing.Web_Remarks:

Heart- warming views of the beach and the sea with ample space for you to sit in the balcony and cherish your pre-work coffee or post-work drink.

The extra room included in this 2 bed apartment along with a well- equipped kitchen; and of course, a generous landlord, makes this 1600 sq ft unit, the best catch in the shoreline

Depending on your taste, this apartment guarantees to spoil your bad mood.

Apartment is high in demand.
